Row.Text: +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness for every complete ring of owned tiles surrounding the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production toward Buildings.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Magistrate's Court.

The unique State Assembly increases a civilization's [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, increasing with each complete ring of owned Tiles the city possesses. It cannot provide more [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness than there are [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in a city. It also provides a slight increase to city [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty.
Dmitry Mdvedev
Tsar
{1_CivName} Tsardom
Our people are now assaulting our emos and competing in bear-wresting competitions. We're sort of half-and-half on the matter.
Restore the Imperial Throne

For decades past, the imperial throne of ancient Russia has laid vacant; concealed by the unforgiving machinations of the modern century. To be the one to restore her imperial dignity would be both a grace upon her people and a deference unto God.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Putin) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants all [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies from the Tradition Branch [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture reward increases for every Tradition policy you already possess

For decades past, the imperial throne of ancient Russia has laid vacant; concealed by the unforgiving machinations of the modern century. To be the one to restore her imperial dignity would be both a grace upon her people and a deference unto God.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Putin) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants a cause with which to push a [ICON_JFD_CLAIM_MEDIUM] Claim on neighbouring City-States

Dammit, I didn't mean take it for yourself![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants all [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies from the Tradition Branch [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a lump sum of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every Tradition Policy that you already possess

Dammit, I didn't mean take it for yourself![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grants a cause with which to push a [ICON_JFD_CLAIM_MEDIUM] Claim on neighbouring City-States
{1_Name} has restored the imperial throne of Russia, but has declared himself Emperor!
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Imperial Claim
Seize Broadcasting Companies

In order to better secure our rule over the Russian people, it would be wise to ensure the compliance of the media by making them a state institution. This is, of course, in the best interests of our people.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Russia (Putin) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Radio [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have an available Great Work of Music slot [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Broadcast Towers [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from each Broadcast Tower [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Great Work of Music

In order to better secure our rule over the Russian people, it would be wise to ensure the compliance of the media by making them a state institution. This is, of course, in the best interests of our people.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from Broadcast Towers [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from each Broadcast Tower [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Great Work of Music
{1_Name} has seized all private broadcasting companies in {2_CivName}.
Alexander Alexandrov
National Anthem
A new form of democracy in which only Vladimir Putin may be declared victor has been invented in the city of {1_City}!
Strong-man Competition

Once more, the annual strong-man competition has been called between the world's most muscly leaders. In this event, we have been invited to wrestle with {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}; to prove our superior muscles and our right to dominate the Russian people.[NEWLINE]
We pledged an oath to God and to the Russian People. We shall not concede!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance you will be humilitated, eat a tub of vodka-ice cream, and lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% chance that your mightiness will be vindicated and all cities begin celebrating 'We Love the Putin Day' for five turns.[ENDCOLOR]
Oh no! We have lost the annual strong-man competition to {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}. We bring great shame to the Russian people.
Happy days! We were victorious in the annual strong-man competition against {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}.
Vladimir Putin has lost the annual strong-man competition against {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}.
Vladimir Putin has won the annual strong-man competition against {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}.
Emo Plague

The city of {1_CityName} has been recently plagued by a wave of suicides, teary-eyed adolescents, and festivals (self-depreciating rituals?) of {2_EmoBand}: these are signs of the emo plague.[NEWLINE]
It is Bolica's will that the emos conquer us. We must submit.
The only solution is to purge the city.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} loses 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens because they kill themselves[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT][ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness now contributes to [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Progress,[ENDCOLOR][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]whereas [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness now detracts from it[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The empire's borders change to black (re-load for full emoness)[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} loses 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens because they kill themselves[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_CityName} begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have submitted to the will of Bolica, the Emo Goddess. Hail Bolica.
We have purged the emos plaguing the city of {1_CityName}, bringing the city peace and joy and less blood-stained sheets.
Vladimir Putin of Russia has submitted to the Emo Goddess Bolica.
Vladimir Putin of Russia has purged one of his cities of an emo plague.
{1_Num} is subtracted per turn from your [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness.
{1_Num} is added per turn from your [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness.
Viraemia
Ceresitia
Onierosan
Jaskyrose
Pretty Hedon City
Aspheron
Mykarel
Lavender Town
Iscyabane
Neverfall
Synderion
Pittsburgh
adfqefdsfgwrfsadcfqeasdaswqdf
Powerful Oligarchs

Several of the wealthiest men in the country have begun to accrue a threatening level of power. We must intervene, lest they grow to a position in which they could interfere in our authority.[NEWLINE]
A special tax shall clip their wings.
Throw them in jail then!
These Oligarchs could make for strong allies.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]30% chance that the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital will go into 3 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The Palace yields +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital will go into 1 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate[ENDCOLOR]
To curb the growing power of the Oligarchs, we have implemented a special tax.
To curb the growing power of the Oligarchs, we have implemented a special tax. With this they were none too pleased.
To curb their growing power, we have thrown several Oligarchs in jail.
To curb their growing power, we have thrown several Oligarchs in jail. With this they were none too pleased.
To curb their growing power, we have allied ourselves with several Oligarchs.
Lyudmila Shkrebneva
